title: TO RIOT AND THE MODS!
body:
go ahead and keep silencing me you oversensitive, lying and biaised people!

IM NOT DONE CALLING YOU OUT ON EVERYTHING THAT IS WRONG WITH THIS GAME AND TELLING PEOPLE HOW STUPID THEY ARE FOR FALLING INTO YOUR TRAPS

but you can keep trying to stop me, it just proves how you '' protect your community'' from people who dont submit to your will and dont ''act accordingly to your rules''

YOU FKIN PEOPLE MAKE ME SO MAD BECAUSE OF THE WAY YOU DO THINGS! WHY WOULD I BE NICE?!?!?

IF YOU WANT YOUR PLAYERS TO RESPECT YOU WHAT ABOUT YOU RESPECT YOUR PLAYERS FIRST!!!

GG WP RIOT, NOBODY WINS!

replies.body:
>WHY WOULD I BE NICE?!?!?

You don't have to be nice. You have to abide by the rules. There are options other than "being nice" and "actively being a jerk."

those rules are only made to silence us.... you people could remove only the insults but you remove the whole posts

WE HAVE THE RIGHT TO BE ANGRY AND SHOW IT TO EVERYONE!

We lack the manpower, the time, and the inclination to manually fix every post that violates the rules. Learn to follow them or don't post.

Further, it isn't others' job to make your post in line with the rules, it's yours.

but keep defending them since you like doing thta so much!!!

Right because pointing out your wrong and showing how you are making mistakes is insulting. Maybe you need to change and try to be a little bit better of a person. You are a specialist for player behavior, your are supposed to set a good example for people. You need to realize that you can’t go around accusing everyone of being toxic and defending riots every decision even if they are wrong. I’m not trying to be mean I’m just trying to help you be a better specialist and make the boards a better place.

1. Your opinion that Riot is wrong does not equate to them being wrong.

2. Your disagreement with the rules does not change the fact that a punishment was correctly issued based on the rules.

3. You expressing your *opinion* about the punishment does not help players who come to the board confused as to why they were punished, nor does it help them avoid future punishment.

4. You have taken yet again to insulting me here. You say I need to "be a little bit better of a person". Putting diminutives in here ("little bit") does not change the fact it's insulting.

1. Duh, that's how opinions work 
2. Rules are interpreted so whether it's correctly issued is purely a fictional task taken by riot, so you know just as little as OP
3. Your opinion on his opinion is equally false. You have no way to know whether his opinion will or will not help other players. 
4. Didn't read the insults, but I do not believe in insulting people.

1. 

2. Rules are interpreted. The players who most frequently have posted on the Player Behavior boards have learned based on Riot employees' comments their interpretation of those rules.

3. Saying "I think your punishment was not accurate, you shouldn't have been punished, the rules suck" does nothing to help the player understand why their behavior was considered against the rules.
